text: Lindop is a surname. Notable people by that name include: * Grevel Lindop (born 1948), English poet. * Fred Lindop, former British rugby league referee. * Audrey Erskine Lindop (1920–1986) English writer. * Hubert Lindop (1907–1982), English cricketer. * Patricia Lindop (1930-2018), professor of radiation biology.
title: Lindop
